rules: Rule1: The Project completes ahead of schedule, or if the Conservator identifies a problem with the Pigment, then the Pigment does not require special treatment.
Rule2: The Project receives an extension, or the Project does not meet its deadline.
Rule3: If the Project passes inspection, then the regulatory body approves the Project.
Rule4: If the Project achieves its milestone, then the Project passes inspection.
Rule5: The Project wins an award, or if the Project meets its deadline, then the Project gains recognition.
Rule6: If the regulatory body approves the Project, then the Consortium does not have funding for the Project.
Rule7: If the Conservator uses traditional tools, then the Conservator follows conservation guidelines.
Rule8: The Conservator uses traditional tools, or the Conservator uses digital tools.
Rule9: If the Conservator applies chemical treatments, then the Conservator does not cause damage to the Artwork.
Rule10: If the Conservator uses mechanical methods, then the Conservator does not cause damage to the Artwork.
Rule11: If the Conservator identifies a problem with the Pigment, then the Pigment requires special treatment.
Rule12: The Conservator identifies a problem with the Pigment, or the Conservator applies chemical treatments, or the Conservator uses mechanical methods.
Rule13: If it is not the case that using digital tools leads the Conservator to follow guidelines, then the Conservator causes damage to the Artwork.
Rule14: If it is not the case that not following guidelines results in regulatory body approval of the Project, then the Consortium halts the project.
Rule15: If it is not the case that not following guidelines leads to regulatory body approval of the Project, then the Consortium does not halt the project.
Rule16: If the Conservator does not follow guidelines, then the Consortium has funding for the Project.
Rule17: If the Conservator does not follow guidelines, then the Project meets its deadline.
Rule18: If the Conservator does not follow guidelines, then the Project achieves its milestone.
facts: Fact1: The Project does not complete ahead of schedule.
Fact2: The Project does not receive an extension.
Fact3: The Project does not gain recognition.
Fact4: The Project does not win an award.
